<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><callable_outputs/><copied_from/><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><mugshots_cache_json/><notes/><order>1</order><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 11:37:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>6eb52b733b90f25062bf612c95e45a12</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Deployer WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_deployer">394148f9db1c2d906a03dad1f396197a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Deployer WORK IN PROGRESS">394148f9db1c2d906a03dad1f396197a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_6eb52b733b90f25062bf612c95e45a12</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 11:45:07</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="Deployer - Deployer Controller API - Start Deployment">2eb5e7733b90f25062bf612c95e45a19</test><timeout/><warning_message/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=6eb52b733b90f25062bf612c95e45a12"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>6eb52b733b90f25062bf612c95e45a12</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 11:37:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>62b52b733b90f25062bf612c95e45a14</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 11:37:45</sys_updated_on><value>3.1</value><variable display_value="Jasmine version">42f2564b73031300440211d8faf6a777</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>6eb52b733b90f25062bf612c95e45a12</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 11:37:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>6ab52b733b90f25062bf612c95e45a14</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 11:45:08</sys_updated_on><value>(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual)
{
	var test = new x_snc_devtools.TestAPI(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);
	
	test.SetResult(true);
	
	test.TestCase_RestApiOperation(
		'Deployer Controller API',
		'Start Deployment',
		null,
		null,
		'User Not Authenticated');

	var testdata = new x_snc_devtools.TestDataAPI('DEPLOYER');
	var strPassword = x_snc_devtools.GetRandomNumericToken(30);

	var strUserNoRolesSysId = testdata.CreateUser('NOROLES',[],false,'',strPassword);
	var grUserNoRoles = x_snc_devtools.GetUserRecord(strUserNoRolesSysId);
	var oBasicAuth = {
		username: x_snc_devtools.GetStringValue(grUserNoRoles.user_name),
		password: strPassword
	};
	
	test.TestCase_RestApiOperation(
		'Deployer Controller API',
		'Start Deployment',
		oBasicAuth,
		null,
		'User Not Authorized');
	
	var strUserWithRoleSysId = testdata.CreateUser('API',['x_snc_deployer.api'],false,'',strPassword);
	var grUserWithRole = x_snc_devtools.GetUserRecord(strUserWithRoleSysId);
	var oBasicAuth = {
		username: x_snc_devtools.GetStringValue(grUserWithRole.user_name),
		password: strPassword
	};
	
	test.TestCase_RestApiOperation(
		'Deployer Controller API',
		'Start Deployment',
		oBasicAuth,
		null,
		'INSTANCE_NOT_SPECIFIED');	

	
	return test.GetResult();
	
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);</value><variable display_value="Test script">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
